concept.title: Topic headings and groups
concept.shortdesc: You can use topic headings when you need a division in the table of contents without a corresponding topic. You can use topic groups when you need to create a relationship or grouping of topics without using a parent topic.

conbody.p: Both <topichead> and <topicgroup> elements are variants of <topicref> without the href attribute. For <topichead>, the navtitle becomes compulsory, since it is primarily for creating text-only headers in a navigation tree or table of contents. For <topicgroup>, there are no titles, since it is primarily for creating groups with different collection-type values.
